Key Match Events: The U.S. fell short by 18 runs against South Africa
Post-Match Reflections: U.S. captain Aaron Jones expressed disappointment in the defeat
Miscellaneous Highlights: The U.S. qualified for the Super Eight phase of the T20 World Cup
Others: Quinton De Kock top scored for South Africa with 74 runs from 40 balls
Aiden Markram scored 46 runs for South Africa
Andries Gous scored 80 unbeaten runs for the U.S.
Harmeet Singh scored 38 runs for the U.S.
Kagiso Rabada took the wicket of Harmeet in the 19th over for South Africa
